Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Nicos and the whole team are amazing! I had a craving for Greek food. As a Greek myself I have high standards but this was as good as the best restaurants in Greece! ‚Ä¶

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text:
First time trying Greek cuisine in Amsterdam, my friend and I loved it!!
Workers and the owner of the restaurant were extremely helpful and friendly. Will definitely come again ;) ‚Ä¶

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Amazing gyros in lamb, chicken and aubergine- zucchini versions. The spinach-filled bakery product is also delicious, 95% filling.

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Very delicious food. We have been to Romios for lunch and tasted a wide selection of food. It was all really tasty. Will come back to have dinner.

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: This is the best Greek restaurant I have ever been to! Actually the best food I have eaten in Amsterdam! :) The staff are incredibly friendly and the food is really delicious and very affordable. We came for my partners birthday and it was such a lovely experience. I almost felt like we were in Greece :D 150% recommended!

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text:
Authentic greek cuisine !
I had dinner with my friends last week and everithing was so delicious !!
They are very nice and make you feel very comfortable! ‚Ä¶

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Wow! Amazing. Everything was perfect, food was to die for, great prices, staff is lovely and attentive. Wish I could eat here everyday.

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Very nice Greek taverna. The food is amazing and the neighbour has excellent wines so together they‚Äôre the best experience!

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Amazing Greek food! Great friendly staff, cozy atmosphere!

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Hidden gem!!! We loved everything about this place... Ordered different little plates (went for tsatziki twice!) plus octopus and lamb chops from the grill. Everything was delicious and we can't recommend this place enough. Owners are lovely and friendly!! Would come back again.

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Food was fantastic! Chef is very pleasant and kind person. I recommend trying out paidakia, best ribs I ever ate.

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Been there for the first time after hearing great things about this place! It's all true. Food was absolutely delicious and the staff was very friendly. Definitely going there again when I get the craving for some authentic greek food!

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Surely the best Greek food  in the area

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: I'm Greek, and I have been to thousand of taverns in Greece and Germany and other places and almost all in Amsterdam and I would say that this is the most close and authentic to Greek cuisine, not the other ones around in Amsterdam. ‚Ä¶

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: A cosy, intimate restaurant in the middle of Amsterdam. The food is great and the owners are amazing people. Don‚Äôt miss it! :)

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Amazing food, friendly staff, charming restaurant. Always have a wonderful experience eating there!

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Lovely authentic greek restaurant, food and staff were lovely! Will come again next time in Amsterdam!

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Tasty homemade Greek cuisine and the BEST pita gyros in Amsterdam! People are so friendly making me feel like home every time step in

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Authentic greek cuisine in a lovely cozy space. There is a variety of greek products you can purchase on spot too. Definitely going to revisit !

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Excellent Greek food, delicious marinated grill, great and friendly service. Thoroughly recommended.

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Best of the Best! Gyros pita in whatever version you order are OUT OF THIS WORLD. Bread is incredibly soft, lamb/chicken are cooked with lots of flavour and they are sooo tender. Service fits all toughest Mediterranean expectations. Highly recommended. Don't wait around, pay Niko and his team a visit as soon as possible

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Phenomenal food at a great price. The service was fantastic and well personalised and they remember you when you come back. Also have a set up at the moment with the wine bar next door, highly recommend. I got the lamb, loved it.

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Authentic, delicious greek food. The gyros is outstanding and the service is also really nice. Fully recommended. I will definitely come back

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: We had the best Gyros I have had in my life for lunch, and took some tapas home for dinner. Every thing was amazing. The Spanakopita was a highlight, but the Kolokithokeftedes were particularly delicious. I had never had one before, but I can see it becoming a new staple in our house.

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text:
The best Greek place to be!
Absolutely amazing food and beautiful people.
Fresh and high quality food, taste brings the summer:)

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Really great amazing homemade tasty food at good price üòã thank-you üòÉ

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Excellent place for those who love Greek traditional cuisine. There is a variety of dishes for both meat lovers, as well as for vegetarians. All products come from Greece and the owner and the staff are very friendly and helpful. I highly recommend it since it one of the few taverns outside Greece that serve traditional Greek food!

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Amazing greek food! Loved the food and the attention. The owner is super nice and they have really affordable prices for Amsterdam life style. We will be back! ‚Ä¶

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Super friendly people and good food for very good prices!

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Best Greek food in town! Authentic Greek dishes, made with love and excellent ingredients. Plus, the people are so warm and friendly that you feel like you really are in a Greek taverna. We'll keep coming!

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Love this place! Been coming here for a few years and the food is always super tasty and very affordable. There are a lot of vegetarian and vegan options as well which is great. Staff is friendly and helpful :)

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Romios taverna is a small and attractive restaurant in the heart of Pijp, Amsterdam. For some time I was considering to visit the place and recently I did. I was pleasantly surprised and my experience exceeded all my expectations. ‚Ä¶

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: Amazing authentic Greek food, great service and friendly staff! If you want to eat tasty traditional Greek food in Amsterdam look no further!

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: I could not recommend it enough!! Everything we have tried so far was absolutely delicious. Authentic Greek food (approved by my Greek husband) which is very difficult to find, so glad we discovered this gem.

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios

Name: Griekse Traiterie Romios
Review Text: If you're looking for the best souvlaki/gyros in town and a great selection of yummy traditional appetizers and main dishes, go to Romios. Nikos offers you a taste of Greek gezelligheid and raki in Amsterdam.

Review Text: The best Greek restaurant in town! Friendly staff, affordable prices and delicious traditional homemade food ;) Please keep it like this!
